description:
On a particular day full of tension at the Masaki house, everybody is waiting for that moment.
They are waiting for their new family member who will be Nobuyuki and Rea`s first child and Tenchi`s brother.
With the entire Masaki family standing by, Tenchi`s brother "Masaki Kenshi" lets out his first cry.
But for Kenshi, this already marked the beginning of a heavy fate awaiting him.
A few years later --
The women lead by Seto and Washu, and the men aiming to stop the women, lead by Juraian emperor Azusa and including the "Seto inhibitor" Seina, gather to discuss Kenshi`s development.
While the disquieting discussions continue, Kenshi`s mother Rea makes a decision.
Source: crunchyroll
